public ref class WebFormsRootDesigner abstract : IDisposable, System::ComponentModel::Design::IDesigner, System::ComponentModel::Design::IDesignerFilter, System::ComponentModel::Design::IRootDesigner

summary.span: 提供 Web Forms 網頁設計階段功能的基底類別，並允許在執行階段存取與操作 Web Forms 網頁內所包含的元件和控制項。

span.span: Provides a base class for the design-time functionality of a Web Forms page and allows access to and manipulation of components and controls that are contained within the Web Forms page at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計裝載，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，必須提供自己的衍生的版本透過控制項設計工具類別設計工具的屬性。A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], must provide its own derived version of the class to control designers through the property of the designer. 控制設計工具使用來存取及管理包含 Web Forms 網頁設計階段屬性。Control designers use the property to access and manipulate the containing Web Forms page at design time.

block.para:
當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫下列成員：
When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members:
- ， ， ， ， ，和屬性。The , , , , , and properties.
- ， ， ， ，和方法。The , , , , and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string AddControlToDocument (System.Web.UI.Control newControl, System.Web.UI.Control referenceControl, System.Web.UI.Design.ControlLocation location);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string AddControlToDocument(class System.Web.UI.Control newControl, class System.Web.UI.Control referenceControl, valuetype System.Web.UI.Design.ControlLocation location) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function AddControlToDocument (newControl As Control, referenceControl As Control, location As ControlLocation) As String
public: abstract System::String ^ AddControlToDocument(System::Web::UI::Control ^ newControl, System::Web::UI::Control ^ referenceControl, System::Web::UI::Design::ControlLocation location);

param.name: newControl
param.span: 要加入至 Web Form 網頁的控制項。

span.span: The control to add to the Web Forms page.

param.name: referenceControl
param.span: 加入 newControl 的相對控制項。

param.name: location
param.span: 表示 newControl 相對於 referenceControl 位置的 值。

span.span: A value that indicates the location for newControl relative to referenceControl.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將 Web 伺服器控制項加入 Web Form 網頁。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, adds a Web server control to the Web Forms page.

returns.span: 所加入之控制項的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the control that was added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有相同識別碼的 Web Form 網頁中已經有控制項，控制項可能已經有指派的識別碼，雖然會指派新的識別碼。Although a control might already have an ID assigned to it, if there is already a control in the Web Forms page with the same ID, a new ID is assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫控制項設計工具和動作項目控制項設計工具，例如實作於 Web Forms 網頁設計主應用程式，透過提供一種方式[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。The method is called by a control designer and provides a way for action items for the control designer to be implemented in the Web Forms page through a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)].

param.name: view
param.span: 當 方法傳回時，view 會包含 物件，該物件提供在設計階段對控制項之視覺化表示和內容的存取權限。

span.span: When the method returns, view contains an object that provides access to the visual representation and content of a control at design time.

param.span: 傳遞 view 時不需設定初始值。

span.span: view is passed uninitialized.

param.name: tag
param.span: 當 方法傳回時，tag 會包含 物件，該物件提供對控制項的控制項設計工具之 HTML 元素的存取權限。

param.span: 傳遞 tag 時不需設定初始值。

span.span: tag is passed uninitialized.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Verbs As DesignerVerbCollection

summary.span: 取得設計工具所支援的設計階段動詞命令。

span.span: Gets the design-time verbs that are supported by the designer.

value.span: 設計工具所支援之 物件的陣列，如果元件沒有動詞命令，則為 。

span.span: An array of objects supported by the designer; otherwise, , if the component has no verbs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 一般來說，在設計階段環境提供**屬性**命令的捷徑功能表上的元件。Typically, a design-time environment provides a **Properties** command on a shortcut menu for a component. 因此，請勿指定設計工具的指令動詞的集合中包含類似的項目。Therefore, do not include a similar entry in the collection of designer-specified verbs.
